title: beacon node gets killed after some time
body:
## Description

I try to get into the medalla testnet with 2 validators. My beacon node instance gets killed after some time. The time it gets killed increased to some hours now. 

setup eth1 node and iam running a well configured lighthouse -vc, which acutally always results with:

## Version

`master` git pull and restart instance always done after a crash happens
Lighthouse v0.2.1-04e4389e

## Present Behaviour

Instance ends without much informations what has caused that issue

## Expected Behaviour

should not end without information from an unexpected state

## Steps to resolve

find the crash or reason why it ends and write some help to stdout
